Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Fade_in_part1
Phrase: Dim light and stuffy air of limbo

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Fade_in_part2
Phrase: Old guardian beholds that I never get out of failure

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Fade_in_part3
Phrase: This is no more than an Inept scoff at my wit

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_start_part_1
Phrase: I'm in my cell standing by the dressing table, Axel is standing behind.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_start_part_2
Phrase:
You
takes a deep breath

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_start_part_3
Phrase:
Axel
Why are you looking for it, Ma'am?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_start_part_4
Phrase:
You
Cause that's the last valuable thing I own, warden.
Right. Let's have a look.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Poster_Dialog1_start_part_1
Phrase: You looks at the burlesque images on the wall.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Poster_Dialog1_start_part_2
Phrase:
You
Look at this. "The most desired burlesque dancer in her Solar System".
Not a bad way to start a career. Anyway, that was a long, long time ago.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_1
Phrase: You looks at the bookshelf.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_2
Phrase:
You
Lots of books.
I often find book characters much more sophisticated than real life people. Such a shame.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_3
Phrase:
You
I wish I could talk to someone like ...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_4_a
Phrase:
You
There's nothing's sexier than a woman with ambition and a man of inner strength.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_4_b
Phrase:
You
Oh, yes. He'd keep me entertained.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_4_c
Phrase:
You
I'm sure he'd make a good listener.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Book_Dialog1_start_part_5
Phrase: A lot of good books here, but no sign of a cigarette holder

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_1_part_1
Phrase:
Axel
Need help?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_1_part_2
Phrase:
Axel
Did you try the jewelry box? I would place it there.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_1_part_3
Phrase:
Axel
Good luck then.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_2_part_1
Phrase:
Axel
So?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_2_part_2_a
Phrase:
Axel
I just guessed. Sorry, my lady.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_2_part_2_b
Phrase:
Axel
I would not dare, my lady. I'm sorry.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog1_interlude_2_part_3
Phrase:
You
What a fool.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_1
Phrase: You checks the jewelry box.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_2
Phrase: Nothing here. Well, nothing that might come in handy in this shithole. Though I would appreciate some...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_3_a
Phrase:
You
Oh, they are my favorite! A taste to die for...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_3_b
Phrase:
You
What? A must have for every lady these days.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_3_c
Phrase:
You
A real lady always has a scar to cover.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Box_Dialog1_start_part_4
Phrase:
You
Unfortunately, there is none. Like there is no cigarette holder. Where did I leave it?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Drawer_Dialog1_start_part_1
Phrase: Vanessa opens the drawer of her dressing table and takes out the cigarette holder.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Drawer_Dialog1_start_part_2
Phrase:
You
There it is! Now, I'm ready to get the hell out of here.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Drawer_Dialog1_start_part_3
Phrase:
Axel
I'm sorry, Ma'am, did you say something?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_1
Phrase:
You
Ah, warden. You're gonna try to sweet-talk me again, aren't you? Don't worry, you'll play your part soon.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_2
Phrase:
You
Did you get what I asked you?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_3
Phrase:
Axel
Absolutely. I brought you some little somethings! Your favorite perfume and some hair pins.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_4
Phrase:
You
Oh, did you?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_5_a
Phrase:
You
You're a tryhard, warden. I've always had a soft spot for the most dedicated workers.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_6_a
Phrase:
You
Good for the business, yet completely clueless about their lives.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_7_a
Phrase:
Axel
Living on our inhospitable planet, one must learn to find pleasure in simple things, my lady.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_5_b
Phrase:
You
Trying hard to please me, warden?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_6_b
Phrase:
Axel
Seems like not hard enough, my lady!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_8
Phrase:
Axel
You see, I like to see you smile. But, unfortunately, that doesn't happen very often.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_9
Phrase:
You
Oh, poor old man, you'd better beware of your lusts.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_10_knot
Phrase:
You
Seems like I didn't match his expextations. I need to pick up the right words

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_10_a
Phrase:
You
In the old days a poet once said: "There's daggers in men's smiles".

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_11_a
Phrase:
You
Now imagine what my smile can do.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_12_a
Phrase:
Axel
I thank you for your concern, Ma'am. But I'd rather come near you and burn alive than carry on with my pathetic existence.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_13_a
Phrase:
You
Burn alive, did you say?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_10_b
Phrase:
You
Oh, you are a sweet darling, warden!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_11_b
Phrase:
Axel
You're smiling again, Ma'am! You make me feel younger when you do that.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_10_c
Phrase:
You
That must feel terrible, living all by yourself...taking care of this rotten, soulless place!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_11_c
Phrase:
Axel
Terrible is not the word, Madam.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_12_c
Phrase:
Axel
I wasn't always like this, I swear! I had a wife, and a house, but it was a long, long time ago.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_13_c
Phrase:
You
Yes, things could have worked out differently for you, warden.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_10_d
Phrase:
You
You know, you could get a lot more than that... if you do me a small favor.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_11_d
Phrase:
Axel
Madam! I didn't even dream that you would...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_12_d
Phrase:
You
I'm sure you did, warden.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_14
Phrase:
Axel
You are one of a kind, Vanessa.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_15
Phrase:
Axel
If only I was a little younger...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_16_a
Phrase:
You
Then what? Don't be ridiculous, old man!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_17_a
Phrase:
Axel
How can you say that?! You know, you will be my age one day. If live long enough, of course.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_18_a
Phrase:
Axel
Your beauty and wits all gone. You will see what I see. You will feel just what I feel!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_19_a
Phrase:
You
Relax. This has nothing to do with age.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_16_b
Phrase:
You
Regret is for the weak, warden. Didn't you know that?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_17_b
Phrase:
Axel
I expected you to say that! You're a lot stronger than most people I've seen.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_16_c
Phrase:
You
Don't do this to yourself, warden. There's no room for regret in this life.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_17_c
Phrase:
Axel
Was that sympathy in your voice? You're such a mystery to me, my lady.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_20
Phrase:
You
You know what the difference is between you and me?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_21
Phrase:
You
I am the one who decides what comes next.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_22_knot
Phrase:
You
I feel his will weakens under desires suppression. Just a little more right words, a small incentive speech, and he becomes my obedient puppy....

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_22_loop
Phrase:
You
I need to flatter him the way he enjoys it

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_22_knot_interlude
Phrase:
You
Well, if that's what you want...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_23_a
Phrase:
You
What day is it?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_24_a
Phrase:
Axel
I can't remember, my lady. Why would that matter anyway? You are going to stay here for a very long time...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_25_a
Phrase:
You
It's your only day off, warden. Yet, you're here. We both know why.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_23_b
Phrase:
Axel
Why are you looking at me like that, Ma'am?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_24_b
Phrase:
You
You are still a good looking man, I must say. Perhaps it's the air around here.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_25_b
Phrase:
Axel
Oh, I'm feeling very young deep inside. Especially, when you are near me, my lady!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_23_c
Phrase:
You
What's the worst thing that could happen to you right now, warden?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_24_c
Phrase:
Axel
The worst thing would be If one day I don't find you here. Though you would surely like it ...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_25_c
Phrase:
You
Yeah, I'd appreciate a sip of freedom.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_23_d
Phrase:
You
Come, take my hand. Come on, don't be shy.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_24_d
Phrase:
Axel
I couldn't have asked for more, my lady!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_25_d
Phrase:
You
You're incredibly easy to please.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_26_d
Phrase:
Axel
Your skin is so soft...I could easily lose myself in you...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_27
Phrase:
Axel
I hope I didn't come for nothing...You know, if you were a bit nicer to me, I could help you with that.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_28
Phrase:
You
Good. And now, will you do me a little favor, Axel?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_29
Phrase:
Axel
Anything you say, my queen.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_30
Phrase:
You
Oh, it's nothing much. Can you...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_31_a
Phrase:
You
Pass me your gun? I really need to see it.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_32_a
Phrase:
Axel
Nobody's ever touched my gun, my sweet lady. What makes you think you can have it?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_33_a
Phrase:
You
Oh, I guess, you didn't hear me right. I want your gun, warden. And you will give it to me willingly.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_1_a
Phrase:
Axel
God...I don't want to do this! But I can't resist you...What are you, Vanessa?!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_2_a
Phrase:
You
Good boy. There, that wasn't so hard, now, was it?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_31_b
Phrase:
You
You have too much clothing on for my liking...let me take care of that, but don't move, okay?

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_32_b
Phrase:
Axel
I...I will not dare, my queen. My life's in your hands...

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_33_b
Phrase:
You
In every f***ing sense, you fool.

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_start_part_34_b
Phrase: You embrace Axel's body. He moans and shakes from anticipation when you rapidly tear a gun from his holster

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_1_b
Phrase:
Axel
I cannot believe this! You witch... Give me my gun back!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_3
Phrase:
Axel
What are you going to do with it?!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_4
Phrase:
Axel
NO, Please, NO! Please... I'd never get over losing you, Vanessa!

Name: Chapter1_Part1_Bar_Axel_Dialog2_final_part_5
Phrase:
You
Sorry, old man.
